I have extensive experience with building back-end endpoints using Express, MySQL, MongoDB & Firebase. I also have skill with building and implementing front-end design using React js, Android XML, Bootstrap & Material Design. The main languages that I became familiar with are Java, JavaScript, Kotlin, and PHP. I have a love for architecture and coding is my tool to build usable softwares. I love coding for hours and get in the zone with some Lofi in the background

projects.title: ScanMe
projects.description: ScanMe is an Android application that scans product's barcodes and compare the product price online. The application recognizes products such as: groceries, pharmacy products, bathroom items and electronics. The application uses the Zxing Library to scan barcodes. The barcodes are sent into our price search algorithm and return with the best price and the least amount of time before the user can get the product.

projects.title: Classis Movies Ticket Online Booking
projects.description: This was my first freelancer project. Planner app is web application made using React js. It was made for online tutors to plan their student agenda. The application uses Firebase to keep track of the agenda. I learned a lot struggling with connecting the data from Firebase into the application native agenda. To be honest, this project made me fall in love with Material Design Bootsrap

projects.title: Faya Ferme
projects.description: Made for family owned business in Mali, Africa. It's a React js e-commerce application that uses Redux to create temporary carts.

projects.title: Hangout Chatbox
projects.description: Chat application using Firebase and Google auth to login and create users.! It was my first chat application with React js and learned a lot from the mechanism involved in creating Chat applications. I also learned how to write rules on database access and how to implement Google auth
